item.description:
Hey everyone, sorry for the extremely late notice on here. For those of you who came out Thursday, this is the show I talked about at dinner.

This a charity show for a sweet production company, Bad Habit Productions. I think Lost Marbles will be going on around 6:30.

So get out here and see fellow incubators Ben, Lisa, Robin, Sandy, and myself doing what we, I guarentee you won't be disappointed.

Come in cosutme too, start halloween early maybe win the contest.

Raffle
Costume Contest
Comedy by Andrew K. Stein and Dave Boczenowski
Featuring improv by Babies in Cages, Lost Marbles, and Boris' Kitchen

Tickets are $10 at the door (proceeds to benefit BHP's production of
The Laramie Project)

Any other questions and details let me know, the whole show should be out and over by 9.

Also hey, if you are on facebook too be sure to add me as a friend, i mean if you really are my friends, lol.

Anywayz, latrz incubators!!! Catch you all on Thursday!

Rock on!

Jason J
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be doing it on stage...improv I mean of course
item.name: Ah Late Notice, Lost Marbles show tomorrow night!!!
